info.name: Jupiter Ed Dark Red Theme
info.description: A darker Jupiter Ed for the student section of their website. Only one screenshot is provided out of concern for a possible privacy leak (not that it is needed, the theme is fairly consistent). Feel free to edit or suggest edits. I might plan on doing other color schemes in the future should it become demanded enough. Should you want a particular scheme, you can easily look at the theme in the Stylus/Stylish editor and change all reds to their desired counterparts.
info.additionalInfo:
You can contribute to this style or report an issue here: https://github.com/Raeffion/FireFoxCSS/tree/master/Jupiter%20Ed%20Dark

---------------------------------

[FIX] 12/1/2017: Made buttons gray
[FIX] 4/19/2018: Made filedrop background dark

---------------------------------

Please report bugs and/or make new features suggestions!

Keywords: firefox, chrome, jupitered, jupiter ed, flat, dark, black, design, light, style, dark, Raeffion
